title: This Deal Slashes 20% OFF the Pixel Tablet’s Price!
description: The Pixel tablet features a large 11-inch display that makes it ideal for content consumption, web browsing, as well as everyday tasks and productivity. The post This Deal Slashes 20% OFF the Pixel Tablet’s Price! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: The Pixel tablet features a large 11-inch display that makes it ideal for content consumption, web browsing, as well as everyday tasks and productivity.
text: Google Pixel Tablet with Charging Speaker Dock Lifestyle Photography For folks after a fairly-capable Android tablet, the Google Pixel tablet is a great option, thanks to a combination of hardware essentials, as well as software that’s packed with all the core Google features one can expect from a Pixel device. Right now it’s on sale via Amazon, and interested buyers can grab it for a lower price than usual. The Pixel tablet features a large 11-inch display that makes it ideal for content consumption, web browsing, as well as everyday tasks and productivity. It’s powered by Google’s Tensor G2 chipset, alongside 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage. There’s also a large 7,000 mAh battery onboard, and a pair of 8-megapixel cameras for video calls and photos. You can check it out using the link below. html:
Google Pixel Tablet with Charging Speaker Dock Lifestyle Photography

For folks after a fairly-capable Android tablet, the Google Pixel tablet is a great option, thanks to a combination of hardware essentials, as well as software that’s packed with all the core Google features one can expect from a Pixel device. Right now it’s on sale via Amazon, and interested buyers can grab it for a lower price than usual.

The Pixel tablet features a large 11-inch display that makes it ideal for content consumption, web browsing, as well as everyday tasks and productivity. It’s powered by Google’s Tensor G2 chipset, alongside 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage. There’s also a large 7,000 mAh battery onboard, and a pair of 8-megapixel cameras for video calls and photos. You can check it out using the link below.
